title: Mobile data doesn't work for some apps
content:
After I switch from wifi to mobile data most of the apps can't use internet until I turn data off/on using the app I need to connect to internet (chrome/mail/etc)
Only messengers work normal without this move.
I have turned off data saver or other limitations and don't use battery save mode. 
I'm sure there should be some way to change it in settings but I still can't find it)
Thanks and sorry for my English, I'm not a native speaker
